ticket.title: Implement patch engine with replay protection

in_scope: Enforce expected_base_hash validation before patch application
Emit replay violation event on hash mismatch
Generate patch result with new content hash
Integrate with canonicalizer for deterministic output

steps: Add json-patch crate dependency to apm2-core
Implement PatchEngine struct with apply_json_patch() method

criteria: JSON Patch operations (add, remove, replace, move, copy, test) work correctly
Merge Patch null handling removes fields correctly
Patch with wrong expected_base_hash emits ReplayViolation event
Patch with correct hash produces new_hash matching canonicalized output
All tests pass: cargo test patch_engine

notes.architecture:
Use json-patch crate for RFC 6902/7396 compliance.
Patch -> Validate -> Canonicalize -> Hash pipeline.
Events emitted via existing event framework (dual-tier per DD-0002).
